TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 146
TEI.2.document_title: Antonio Elousua to Stephen F Austin, 08-08-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Antonio Elosua to Austin, November 25, 1828. Asking Austin to return a letter addressed to Captain Thompson and instructing him concerning treatment of a vessel which he had seized. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 146

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Antonio Elosua to Austin, November 25, 1828. Asking Austin to return a letter addressed to Captain Thompson and instructing him concerning treatment of a vessel which he had seized. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="11-25-1828">November 25, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
